text: Zaza is a 1939 American romantic drama movie directed by George Cukor and is the third version of the French play of the same name by Pierre Berton. It stars Claudette Colbert, Herbert Marshall, Bert Lahr, Helen Westley, Constance Collier, Genevieve Tobin, Ann E. Todd, Rex O'Malley and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1930s American romance movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:1939 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by George Cukor Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in the 1890s
title: Zaza (1939 movie)
